gear.name: Motion Tracker
gear.description: Detects movement within a certain radius, useful for detecting hidden enemies.
gear.effect: Adds +1 to all rolls to Seize the Initiative.

gear.name: Medkit
gear.description: Basic medical supplies for treating injuries in the field.
gear.effect: Allows a character to attempt to heal a Wounded ally during battle.

gear.name: Grappling Hook
gear.description: Used for scaling walls or traversing difficult terrain.
gear.effect: Allows a character to climb up to 6" vertically without a skill check.

gear.name: Holo-map
gear.description: Advanced mapping device that creates a 3D holographic map of the surroundings.

gear.name: Comm-link
gear.effect: Allows communication between squad members at any distance.

items.name: Stim-pack
items.effect: Removes all Stun markers from a character.

items.name: Data-slate
items.description: Portable computer for accessing and storing information.
items.effect: Provides +1 to all Savvy rolls related to information or tech.

items.name: Repair Kit
items.effect: Allows attempts to repair malfunctioning weapons during battle.

items.name: Lockpick Set
items.description: Tools for bypassing electronic and mechanical locks.
items.effect: Provides +1 to all rolls related to opening locked doors or containers.

items.name: Survival Kit
items.description: Basic supplies for surviving in hostile environments.
items.effect: Provides +1 to all rolls related to survival in harsh conditions.

armor.name: Trooper Armor
armor.effect: Provides a saving throw on a roll of 5+

armor.name: Heavy Armor
armor.effect: Provides a saving throw on a roll of 4+, but reduces Speed by 1"

armor.name: Stealth Suit
armor.description: Light armor designed for covert operations.
armor.effect: Provides a saving throw on a roll of 6+, but adds +1 to all stealth-related rolls

armor.name: Hazard Suit
armor.description: Specialized armor for protection against environmental hazards.
armor.effect: Provides a saving throw on a roll of 5+ and immunity to environmental effects

armor.name: Powered Armor
armor.effect: Provides a saving throw on a roll of 4+ and increases Toughness by 1

weapon_traits.name: Focused
weapon_traits.effect: Must direct all shots against a single target

weapon_traits.name: Aimed
weapon_traits.effect: Grants +1 Hit bonus if the firer does not move

weapon_traits.name: Area
weapon_traits.effect: Affects all figures within 2" of the target point

weapon_traits.name: Stun
weapon_traits.effect: Will Stun any target within 2" of the target point on a 3+ roll

weapon_traits.name: Launcher
weapon_traits.effect: May fire any grenade type carried up to the range indicated

weapon_traits.name: Overheat
weapon_traits.effect: Weapon malfunctions if all three firing dice score the same number
